responses.rationale: Mixed framing ('spark...panic' vs 'not general panic') defaults to Neutral. No other cues.
Explicit reassurance 'quite low' and 'very, very low' triggers Q5.
Factual report of negative event (cows tested positive) and scale. No explicit framing.
Factual report of negative event (human case, species jump). No explicit framing.
Explicit reassurance 'very much a bird virus' triggers Q5.
Factual report of an unknown/concern. No explicit framing.
Factual report of evidence for negative event (spread). No explicit framing.
Factual report of specific instance of illness/spread. No explicit framing.
Factual report of an unknown/concern from source. No explicit framing.
Explicit reassurance 'risk is low' triggers Q5.
Factual caption reporting negative event (cows tested positive) and scale. No explicit framing.
